Class EnquiryDB

java.lang.Object
data.EnquiryDB
public class EnquiryDB extends Object
Data access class for Enquiry objects. Handles storage and retrieval of enquiries.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EnquiryDB()
    Constructs a new EnquiryDB and loads existing data if available.

  • Method Details

    • saveData

      public void saveData()
      Saves enquiry data to file.

    • addEnquiry

      public boolean addEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Adds a new enquiry to the database.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to add
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was added, false if enquiry ID already exists

    • updateEnquiry

      public boolean updateEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry)
      Updates an existing enquiry in the database.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The enquiry to update
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was updated, false if enquiry ID not found

    • deleteEnquiry

      public boolean deleteEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Deletes an enquiry from the database.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to delete
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry was deleted, false if enquiry ID not found

    • getEnquiry

      public Enquiry getEnquiry(String enquiryId)
      Gets an enquiry by ID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryId - The ID of the enquiry to get
      Returns:
      The enquiry, or null if not found

    • getEnquiriesByApplicant

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByApplicant(String applicantNric)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific applicant.
      Parameters:
      applicantNric - The NRIC of the applicant
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries from the applicant

    • getEnquiriesByProject

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByProject(String projectName)
      Gets all enquiries for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project
      Returns:
      A list of enquiries about the project

    • getEnquiriesByAnswered

      public List<Enquiry> getEnquiriesByAnswered(boolean answered)
      Gets all answered or unanswered enquiries.
      Parameters:
      answered - Whether to filter for answered enquiries
      Returns:
      A list of answered or unanswered enquiries

    • getAllEnquiries

      public List<Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Gets all enquiries in the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all enquiries
